channel.title: Custom Models add bonus'? LOCK PLEASE
channel.description:
Okay, I got some custom models, they work in-game, and I try to add bonus' to Item.cfg, but it does not work, won't let me start up the server when I hit run.bat, when I delete the bonus', it works again. Help? I want to add bonus' to Dragon Claws. Example:
item = 17789 Dragon_Claws A_set_of_fighting_claws. 200000 200000 200000 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 100 20
Doesn't work! :eek: :confused: Help?

item.title: Custom Models add bonus'? LOCK PLEASE
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

first of all, you dont need to compile cfg files… just restart the server when you changed something in it.
second of all you added it wrong somehow. just copy and paste and orginal one in there and change the bonuses.
and fineally this is the wrong section. -.-

Read full topic
